page.title: 06LOCHE PARK
page.content: The employees of Loche Park get paid between Â£70 and Â£100 a week on average,but this includes bonuses. The park will probably stay open indefinately. The Park is locked up at 10pm and there is a patrol man who keeps every thing in order,but he finishes work also at 10pm. There is a lot of vandalism,mostly done by school children,but adults steal the plants.Boats are vandalised and a few people involved and prosecuted. Every week the grass is cut,the grounds are swept,the gardens are weeded and the lawns are edged. There is no profit made by the park.The council finances the Park with rates. The boats make about Â£2_300 a week in the Summer.
